item.title: 阿波罗寻求在信贷繁荣期将印度资产翻番至 40 亿美元
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.）计划在未来三年内将其在印度的管理资产增加一倍，达到 40 亿美元，因为该公司希望利用印度蓬勃发展的私人信贷市场；这一市场的开放也吸引了其他全球巨头。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. plans to double its assets under management in India to $4 billion over the next three years, as it looks to capitalize on the booming private credit market — an opening also attracting other global giants.】

item.title: 巴克莱支持的巴伦乔伊公司因债券市场波动而利润飙升
item.description: 由于债券市场的波动及其新设的阿布扎比办事处推动了这家澳大利亚投资银行的业绩，巴伦乔伊公司的利润激增。【原文：Barrenjoey’s profit surged as bond market volatility and its new Abu Dhabi office boosted performance at the Australian investment bank.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行总部翻修费用爆棚，超过行长预期
item.description: 澳大利亚中央银行悉尼总部 22 层楼的大修工程耗资约 12 亿澳元（约合 7.74 亿美元），几乎是最初估算的五倍。【原文：Australia’s central bank is facing an estimated A$1.2 billion ($774 million) overhaul of its 22-story Sydney head office — almost five times the original estimate — after the discovery of widespread asbestos turned a simple refurbishment into a near total rebuild.】

item.title: 鲍威尔讲话可能提供利率线索，黄金在讲话前保持跌势
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔本周晚些时候发表重要讲话之前，黄金保持小幅下跌。【原文：Gold held a small decline ahead of a key address by Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell later this week, which may give fresh clues on the central bank’s monetary path.】

item.title: 詹姆斯-哈迪（James Hardie）利润下滑，股价创 2020 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 澳大利亚建材制造商詹姆斯-哈迪工业公司（James Hardie Industries Plc）称其季度利润下滑，股价创下五年来最大跌幅。【原文：James Hardie Industries Plc shares tumbled the most in five years after the Australian building materials maker said its quarterly profit sank.】

item.title: 莫迪称赞与中国的关系，贝森特抨击印度富裕家庭
item.description: 在美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特因南亚国家购买俄罗斯石油而对其批评升级之际，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪对改善与中国的关系表示欢迎。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi welcomed improved ties with China as US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent escalated criticism of the South Asian nation over its purchases of Russian oil.】

item.title: 涨幅达 230% 的中国电子商务股面临盈利考验
item.description: 本周，一家中国电子商务公司的惊人涨势将面临关键考验，该公司的财报将揭示其在中国政府打压教育行业后是否取得了成功。【原文：A Chinese e-commerce stock’s stunning rally faces a key test this week, with earnings set to shed light on the success of its pivot away from education following Beijing’s crackdown.】

item.title: 关税之痛加深，日本出口创四年来最大降幅
item.description: 由于美国关税继续对全球商业造成压力，日本出口创下四年多来的最大跌幅，在个人消费仍不稳定的情况下，经济增长前景蒙上阴影。【原文：Japan’s exports sustained their steepest drop in more than four years as US tariffs continued to weigh on global commerce, clouding the outlook for economic growth at a time when personal spending remains unsteady.】

item.title: 香港交易所因首次公开募股热潮而实现创纪录盈利
item.description: 受首次公开募股和交易繁荣的推动，香港交易及结算所有限公司（Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Ltd.）预计将连续第二个季度实现创纪录的利润。【原文：Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Ltd. is estimated to post a record profit for the second straight quarter, buoyed by an initial public offering and trading boom.】

item.title: 行业报告指出美国库存减少，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 在一份报告显示美国库存下降后，石油价格趋于稳定，同时投资者对乌克兰-俄罗斯停战谈判的前景进行了权衡。【原文：Oil steadied after a report signaled a decline in US stockpiles, while investors weighed the outlook for Ukraine-Russia truce talks.】

item.title: 软银 470 亿美元人工智能股票涨势面临停滞风险
item.description: 软银集团股份有限公司（SoftBank Group Corp. ）的股价在经历了本月的反弹后，上行空间似乎有限，周一创下历史新高，增加了超过 7 万亿日元（约合 470 亿美元）。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. shares look to have limited upside after the rally this month that added more than ¥7 trillion ($47 billion) to an all-time high Monday.】

item.title: 白宫推出 TikTok 账户，美国销售情况尚不确定
item.description: 白宫于周二推出了自己的 TikTok 账户，这是唐纳德-特朗普总统继续寻求从中国公司字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd.）手中出售该社交视频应用美国业务时发出的最新支持信号。【原文：The White House launched its own TikTok account on Tuesday, the latest signal of support as President Donald Trump continues to seek a sale of the social video app’s US operations from Chinese company ByteDance Ltd.】

item.title: 美国科技股下滑，亚洲股市承压：市场综述
item.description: 在大型科技股大跌拖累华尔街走低之后，亚洲股市将迎来一个低迷的开局。【原文：Asian stocks are poised for a sluggish start after a selloff in big tech dragged Wall Street lower.】

item.title: 印尼将维持利率不变，普拉博沃推动支出刺激经济增长
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）公布了一项2026年预算，该预算将增加整个经济的支出，在此之后，印尼央行可能将维持其关键利率不变。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank will likely keep its key interest rate unchanged after President Prabowo Subianto unveiled a 2026 budget that ramps up spending across the economy.】

item.title: 帕利哈皮蒂亚的最新 SPAC 瞄准人工智能和加密货币等热门领域
item.description: 查马特-帕利哈皮蒂亚（Chamath Palihapitiya）在放弃证券业近三年后，通过其最新的空白支票公司瞄准了证券市场最热门、风险最高的角落。【原文：Chamath Palihapitiya is targeting the hottest — and riskiest — corners of the stock market with his newest blank-check firm nearly three years after abandoning the industry.】

item.title: Gamescom 展会开幕，《使命召唤》和《乐高蝙蝠侠》发布新消息
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）的《使命召唤》（Call of Duty）和华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：New installments of Microsoft Corp.’s Call of Duty franchise and Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.’s Lego Batman were among the high-profile reveals at the opening night of Gamescom, Europe’s big video-game trade show.】

item.title: 漂移赛车、酒吧狂欢显示日本人对奇特之旅的渴望
item.description: 日元贬值和社交媒体的影响力使日本成为美国人和欧洲人最热门的度假胜地之一。对于日本居民来说，高消费、对行程要求极高的游客激增为他们带来了新的收入来源：体验式旅游。【原文：A weaker yen and the sway of social media influencers turned Japan into one of the hottest vacation destinations for Americans and Europeans. For residents, the surge in high-spending, itinerary-hungry visitors has opened up a new income stream: Experiential tours.】

item.title: 美国住房市场面临挑战，托尔公司订单不及预期
item.description: 豪华建筑商托尔兄弟公司（Toll Brothers Inc.【原文：Luxury builder Toll Brothers Inc. missed analysts’ estimates for quarterly orders as affordability challenges and economic uncertainty held back buyers.】

item.title: 乌拉圭将基准利率降至 8.75%，通胀率达到目标
item.description: 乌拉圭中央银行延长了宽松周期，在连续两个月通胀接近目标之后，将关键利率下调了四分之一个百分点。【原文：Uruguay’s central bank extended its easing cycle by lowering the key interest rate a quarter point following two months of inflation near its target.】

item.title: 鲍威尔讲话使降息半点的赌注面临考验
item.description: 交易员们正热衷于一种特定的期权赌注，这种赌注依赖于鸽派的美联储下个月将利率下调超过四分之一个点。【原文：Traders are piling into one specific options wager that relies on a dovish Federal Reserve slashing interest rates by over a quarter-point next month.】

item.title: 银行、直接借贷者希望为利夫家园再融资 20 亿美元
item.description: 由于私募股权公司持有资产的时间更长，银行和直接贷款机构正在讨论为 Gridiron Capital 支持的 Leaf Home 债务再融资。【原文：Banks and direct lenders are in discussions to refinance the debt of Gridiron Capital-backed Leaf Home as private equity firms hold onto assets for longer.】

item.title: 墨西哥提议与美国成立联合钢铁委员会以加强关系
item.description: 据一位高级贸易官员透露，墨西哥将提议恢复北美钢铁委员会，以改善与美国的贸易关系，减少对亚洲钢铁进口的依赖。【原文：Mexico will propose reinstating a North American steel committee to improve trade ties with the US and reduce reliance on Asian steel imports, according to a top trade official.】

item.title: 抗议与以色列关系的微软员工占领总部校园
item.description: 微软公司的员工已经开始在公司位于华盛顿州雷德蒙德的总部设立抗议营地，加大了呼吁公司停止与以色列就其加沙战争开展业务的活动。【原文：Microsoft Corp. employees have started setting up a protest encampment at the company’s Redmond, Washington, headquarters, ratcheting up a campaign calling for company to stop doing business with Israel over its war in Gaza.】

item.title: 交易员坚持 9 月降息赌注，国债上涨
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）发表讲话之前，交易商坚持押注最快下月降息，国债打破了连续三日的跌势。【原文：Treasuries broke a three-day slide as traders stuck with wagers on interest rate cuts as soon as next month ahead of a speech from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 鲍曼称美联储对人工智能和加密货币的看法 "即将改变
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）表示，银行和监管机构必须拥抱人工智能和加密货币等新技术带来的好处，否则就有可能削弱其在经济中的作用。【原文：Banks and regulators must embrace the benefits of new technologies such as artificial intelligence and crypto or risk diminishing their role in the economy, said US Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman.】

item.title: 维京治疗公司股价下跌 40%，空头获利 5.14 亿美元
item.description: 维京治疗公司（Viking Therapeutics Inc. 的股价出现了九年来最严重的下跌，这让押注该公司的交易商获得了足够大的收益，使他们亏损的一年变成了盈利的一年。【原文：Viking Therapeutics Inc.’s worst stock drop in nine years has handed traders betting against the company a gain big enough to turn their money-losing year into a profitable one.】

item.title: 英特尔 250 亿美元的涨势使其估值达到点阵图时代的水平
item.description: 经过几个月的动荡，英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）的多头们终于得到了耐心的回报。但该股的突然反弹也带来了令人担忧的副作用：估值过高，其最近的先例是二十多年前的网络时代。【原文：After months of turbulence, Intel Corp. bulls are finally being rewarded for their patience. But the stock’s sudden rebound comes with a worrying side-effect: a valuation so high its most recent precedent is from the dot-com era more than two decades ago.】

item.title: 大豆种植者警告特朗普关税将带来 "金融灾难
item.description: 美国大豆种植者正面临 "贸易和金融悬崖"，无法在与中国的长期贸易战中生存。【原文：US soybean farmers are near a “trade and financial precipice” and cannot survive a prolonged trade war with China.】

item.title: 德意志银行称贝森特的降息观点有悖美联储模型
item.description: 德意志银行利率策略师表示，财政部长斯科特-贝森特认为美联储的利率比模型显示的水平高出一个多百分点的观点是错误的。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s view that the Federal Reserve’s interest rate is more than a percentage point above levels indicated by models is wrong, Deutsche Bank interest-rate strategists said.】

item.title: 破产金融科技公司将出售难以收购的私人公司股权
item.description: 倒闭的金融科技初创公司Linqto Inc.获得法院许可，可以尝试出售难以收购的私人公司的宝贵股权，以便为其破产案提供资金。【原文：Collapsed fintech startup Linqto Inc. won court permission to try to sell valuable stakes in hard-to-acquire, private companies so it can fund its bankruptcy case.】
